comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: During the visit to Tanganyika for the Constitutional Conference in Dar es Salaam, March 1961. From left to right the people are Sir John Fletcher-Cooke, Deputy Governor; Lady Turnbull; "Mwalimu" Julius Nyerere; Mrs Evelyn Macleod; HE Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG, Governor of Tanganyika; The Rt. Hon Iain Macleod,MP, Secretary of State for the Colonies.
